title: LLMs in Linguistic Research
text:
ğŸ“‘ Course Brief
Focus: Understanding LLMs and their usage in various linguistics tasks
How: Hands-on learning and paper discussions


ğŸ¯ Learning Objectives

Gaining an intuition of how LLMs work
Getting to know the field of LLM research and development
Familiarizing yourself with different LLM architectures
Learning how to use them for different linguistics tasks (e.g., text analysis, language generation, and language understanding)
Practing using tools like Hugginface for LLM inference and fine-tuning
